EmailTemplate.name: Password Reset Info
EmailTemplate.subject: Urgent: Information to Access FMS system.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
To ensure you can continue to access Salesforce, we are temporarily removing the Duo login requirement. This will require you to use a different web address and reset your Salesforce/FMS password.
You will receive a separate email from Salesforce.com requiring you to set a password. Once reset, go to the following web site and enter your email address and new password. Do not tap on the Duo Single Sign On button
www.login.salesforce.com
Thank you.
FMS Team
